description: This file defines a Python class 'AzureAIFoundry' that interfaces with Azure AI inference models, including methods for request parameter construction, client management, and response parsing. It integrates with Azure's inference SDK and handles both synchronous and asynchronous operations, as well as streaming responses.

classes.name: AzureAIFoundry
classes.description: A class for interacting with Azure AI Interface models, supporting request creation, client management, and response parsing, including streaming capabilities.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Constructs request parameters for Azure AI inference API calls, including optional tools and response formats.

methods.name: _get_client_params
methods.description: Prepares and returns the parameters needed to instantiate Azure AI clients, fetching environment variables if necessary.

methods.name: get_client
methods.description: Returns an Azure AI synchronous client, creating it if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: get_async_client
methods.description: Returns an Azure AI asynchronous client, creating it if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Performs a synchronous chat completion request to Azure AI.

methods.name: ainvoke
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous chat completion request to Azure AI.

methods.name: invoke_stream
methods.description: Performs a streaming chat completion request synchronously.

methods.name: ainvoke_stream
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous streaming chat completion request.

methods.name: parse_provider_response
methods.description: Parses the Azure AI response into a standardized ModelResponse object.

methods.name: parse_tool_calls
methods.description: Builds tool call data from streamed responses.

methods.name: parse_provider_response_delta
methods.description: Parses streaming response chunks into a ModelResponse.
